ARABIC: قَالَ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسْتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَبْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Did I not tell you that you would not be able to bear with me?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "Did I not tell you you will not be able to bear with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Did I not tell you that you will not be able to patiently bear with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He responded, "Did I not tell you that you will not be able to remain patient with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Did I not tell you that you will never be able to patiently stay with me?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Did I not tell you that you can have no patience with me"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Did I not say to you that you will not be able to have patience with me?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Did I not say that thou couldst never bear with me patiently?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Did I not tell thee that thou couldst not bear with me?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The man said, "Did I not tell you that you would not be able to have any patience with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: said I not unto thee that thou wouldst by no means be able to have with me patience?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Did I not tell you that you cannot have patience with me?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He answered: "Did I not tell thee that thou canst have no patience with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Khidr) said: "Did I not tell you that you can have no patience with me?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did I not tell you' he replied, 'that you would not be able to bear patiently with me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Did I not tell you that you will not be able to endure with me?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Al-Khidh r] said, "Did I not tell you that with me you would never be able to have patience?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:75] He said, ‘Did I not say to you that you would never be able to bear with me?’ (laka, ‘to you’, has been added to that [same statement] which was made before because this time there could not be any excuse [for Moses’s impatience].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Khidr said: (Did I not tell thee) Moses (that thou couldst not bear with me? Did I not tell you that you might see me doing something that you will not be able to tolerate?
